languages.text: "Украшения дворца заготовлены, и мы готовы начать по вашему распоряжению. Торжественные мероприятия в столице также организованы, а почетные гости прибыли на планету или ожидают приглашения на ближней орбите. Слуги уже находятся в ваших покоях, чтобы позаботиться о безупречности вашего одеяния".

traits.locale_text: "Украшения дворца заготовлены и готовы начать по вашему распоряжению. Торжественные мероприятия в столице также организованы, а почетные гости прибыли на планету или ожидают приглашения на ближней орбите. Слуги уже находятся в ваших покоях, чтобы позаботиться о безупречности вашего одеяния".

languages.text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."
languages.original_text: "Украшения дворца заготовлены, и мы готовы начать по вашему распоряжению. Торжественные мероприятия в столице также организованы, а почетные гости прибыли на планету или ожидают приглашения на ближней орбите. Слуги уже находятся в ваших покоях, чтобы позаботиться о безупречности вашего одеяния".

traits.locale_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honor either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation at the nearest orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to take care of the impeccability of your garb."

"The palace decorations are prepared and ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honor either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation at the nearest orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to take care of the impeccability of your garb."

The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

"The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

languages.text: 「宮殿の装飾は準備が整っておりますので、陛下のご命令を待つのみです。首都で開かれる祝祭の催し物も同様に手配が完了しております。また、来賓の方々もこの星に到着しているか近くの軌道で招待をお待ちです。従者は陛下のお部屋でこの場にふさわしい身なりを完璧に整えております」
languages.original_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: 「宮殿の装飾は準備が整っておりますので、陛下のご命令を待つのみです。首都で開かれる祝祭の催し物も同様に手配が完了しております。また、来賓の方々もこの星に到着しているか近くの軌道で招待をお待ちです。従者は陛下のお部屋でこの場にふさわしい身なりを完璧に整えております」

languages.text: “宫殿装饰已经布置完毕，首都的庆典活动也已准备就绪，随时等待您的命令。众多宾客目前均已抵达行星，或在近地轨道上等待下一步的邀请。您的侍从正在房间里待命，确保将您打扮得无可挑剔。”
languages.original_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: “宫殿装饰已经布置完毕，首都的庆典活动也已准备就绪，随时等待您的命令。众多宾客目前均已抵达行星，或在近地轨道上等待下一步的邀请。您的侍从正在房间里待命，确保将您打扮得无可挑剔。”

languages.text: «Las decoraciones de palacio están listas, ya solo falta que dé la orden de empezar. También han terminado los preparativos para la celebración por toda la capital y los invitados de honor ya han llegado al planeta o están en órbita esperando recibir la invitación. Los sirvientes ya están esperando en sus aposentos para asegurarse de que su indumentaria sea perfecta para la ocasión».
languages.original_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: «Las decoraciones de palacio están listas, ya solo falta que dé la orden de empezar. También han terminado los preparativos para la celebración por toda la capital y los invitados de honor ya han llegado al planeta o están en órbita esperando recibir la invitación. Los sirvientes ya están esperando en sus aposentos para asegurarse de que su indumentaria sea perfecta para la ocasión».

languages.text: « Les décorations sont en place et nous pourrons commencer dès que vous en donnerez l'ordre. Les festivités prévues dans la capitale sont également prêtes. Quant aux invités d'honneur, ils sont soit déjà arrivés, soit en orbite dans l'attente d'une autorisation d'atterrir. Des serviteurs vous attendent dans vos quartiers pour vous aider à vous vêtir pour l'occasion. »
languages.original_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: « Les décorations sont en place et nous pourrons commencer dès que vous en donnerez l'ordre. Les festivités prévues dans la capitale sont également prêtes. Quant aux invités d'honneur, ils sont soit déjà arrivés, soit en orbite dans l'attente d'une autorisation d'atterrir. Des serviteurs vous attendent dans vos quartiers pour vous aider à vous vêtir pour l'occasion. »

languages.text: "Der Palast ist dekoriert, und wir können auf Euren Befehl hin jederzeit anfangen. Auch die Festaktivitäten in der Hauptstadt sind vorbereitet, und die Ehrengäste sind entweder bereits auf dem Planeten oder warten im Orbit auf Freigabe. Die Diener befinden sich bereits in Euren Gemächern, um Euch dem Anlass entsprechend makellos einzukleiden."
languages.original_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: "Der Palast ist dekoriert, und wir können auf Euren Befehl hin jederzeit anfangen. Auch die Festaktivitäten in der Hauptstadt sind vorbereitet, und die Ehrengäste sind entweder bereits auf dem Planeten oder warten im Orbit auf Freigabe. Die Diener befinden sich bereits in Euren Gemächern, um Euch dem Anlass entsprechend makellos einzukleiden."

languages.text: "Saray süslemeleri hazır, emrinizle başlamaya hazırız. Başkentteki şenlikler de aynı şekilde düzenlendi, onur konukları da ya gezegene indi ya da yakın yörüngede davet bekliyor. Bu merasime uygun kıyafetleri üstünüze uyduracak hizmetkârlar ise sizi odanızda karşılayacak."
languages.original_text: "The palace decorations are prepared and we are ready to begin at your command. The festive activities in the capital have likewise been arranged, and the guests of honour either have arrived on the planet or are awaiting invitation in near orbit. The servants are already in your chambers to see to it that you are impeccably garbed for the occasion."

traits.locale_text: "Saray süslemeleri hazır, emriniz olursa başlamaya hazırız. Başkentteki şenlikler de aynı şekilde düzenlendi ve onur konukları ya gezegene indi ya da yakın yörüngede davet bekliyor. Bu merasime uygun kıyafetleri üstünüze uyduracak hizmetkârlar ise sizi odanızda karşılayacak."
